GroupInfo.title: ORDER BY Clause without OrderModifier
GroupInfo.description: Tests for the ORDER BY part of the FLWOR expression syntax

test-case.name: orderbywithout-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWR expression set to "concat($x,"()") ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "concat($x,"another String After") ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "concat("another String Before",$x) ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "concat($x,"") ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "concat("",$x) ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x is $x ", where $x is a set of nodes with strings as content.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "concat($x,$x) ", where $x is a set of Strings.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "string-length($x) ", where $x is a set of Nodes with strings as content.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "count($x) ", where $x is a set of node with strings as content.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x ", where $x is a set of negative numbers casted as decimals.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "($x + $x) ", where $x is a set of negative numbers casted as decimals.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x is $x ", where $x is a set of nodes with negative numbers as content.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:float($x) ", where $x is a set of negative numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-15
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:double($x) ", where $x is a set of negative numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:integer($x) ", where $x is a set of negative numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "($x * -1) ", where $x is a set of negative numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x ", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "($x + $x) ", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.name: orderbywithout-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x is $x ", where $x is a set of nodes with positive numbers as content.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:float($x) ", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:double($x)", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "xs:integer($x)", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "string($x)", where $x is a set of positive numbers.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x", where $x is a set of small positive numbers casted as decimals.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "($x + $x) ", where $x is a set of small positive numbers casted as decimals.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "order by" clause with the "order by" clause of a FLWOR expression set to "$x is $x ", where $x is a set nodes with small positive numbers as content.
